00021 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 // Function: EndpointEditDialog()
00023 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00024 EndpointEditDialog::EndpointEditDialog(QWidget* parent,
00025                                        EndpointItem const* endpoint) : QDialog(parent), nameEdit_(0),
00026                                                                        typeCombo_(0), btnOK_(0)
00027 {
00028     QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00029 
00030     // Create the name label and field.
00031     QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00032     layout->addWidget(nameLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00033 
00034     nameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00035     layout->addWidget(nameEdit_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00036 
00037     // Create the type label and field.
00038     QLabel* typeLabel = new QLabel(tr("Type:"), this);
00039     layout->addWidget(typeLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00040 
00041     typeCombo_ = new QComboBox(this);
00042     typeCombo_->addItem("In");
00043     typeCombo_->addItem("Out");
00044     layout->addWidget(typeCombo_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00045 
00046     // Create the connection label and field.
00047     QLabel* connLabel = new QLabel(tr("Connection:"), this);
00048     layout->addWidget(connLabel, 2, 0, 1, 1);
00049 
00050     connCombo_ = new QComboBox(this);
00051     connCombo_->addItem("Message");
00052     connCombo_->addItem("Packet");
00053     connCombo_->addItem("Scalar");
00054     layout->addWidget(connCombo_, 2, 1, 1, 1);
00055 
00056     // Create the dialog buttons.
00057     QGridLayout* btnLayout = new QGridLayout();
00058 
00059     btnOK_ = new QPushButton(this);
00060     btnOK_->setText("&OK");
00061     btnLayout->addWidget(btnOK_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00062 
00063     QPushButton* btnCancel = new QPushButton(this);
00064     btnCancel->setText("&Cancel");
00065     btnLayout->addWidget(btnCancel, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00066 
00067     layout->addLayout(btnLayout, 3, 0, 1, 2);
00068 
00069     // Connect the button signals to accept() and reject().
00070     QObject::connect(btnOK_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00071     QObject::connect(btnCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject()));
00072 
00073     // Set the data to the field if an existing endpoint was given.
00074     if (endpoint != 0)
00075     {
00076         nameEdit_->setText(endpoint->getName());
00077         typeCombo_->setCurrentIndex(endpoint->getMCAPIDirection());
00078         connCombo_->setCurrentIndex(endpoint->getConnectionType());
00079         
00080         // Disallow the endpoint type and connection type to be changed if there is already a connection.
00081         if (endpoint->isConnected())
00082         {
00083             typeCombo_->setEnabled(false);
00084             connCombo_->setEnabled(false);
00085         }
00086 
00087         // Also set the dialog title.
00088         setWindowTitle(tr("Edit Endpoint"));
00089     }
00090     else
00091     {
00092         btnOK_->setEnabled(false);
00093         setWindowTitle(tr("Add Endpoint"));
00094     }
00095 
00096     connect(nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SLOT(onContentChanged()));
00097 
00098     setFixedSize(sizeHint());
00099 }
00100

00104 EndpointEditDialog::~EndpointEditDialog()
00105 {
00106 }

00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 // Function: getName()
00110 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00111 QString EndpointEditDialog::getName() const
00112 {
00113     return nameEdit_->text();
00114 }
00115 
00116 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 // Function: getType()
00118 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 MCAPIEndpointDirection EndpointEditDialog::getType() const
00120 {
00121     return static_cast<MCAPIEndpointDirection>(typeCombo_->currentIndex());
00122 }
00123 
00124 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 // Function: getConnectionType()
00126 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 MCAPIDataType EndpointEditDialog::getConnectionType() const
00128 {
00129     return static_cast<MCAPIDataType>(connCombo_->currentIndex());
00130 }

00132 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 // Function: accept()
00134 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 void EndpointEditDialog::accept()
00136 {
00137     // Validate the name.
00138     if (!nameEdit_->text().contains(QRegExp("^[a-z|A-Z|_][a-z|A-Z|0-9|_]*$")))
00139     {
00140         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00141                            tr("The name '%1' is invalid because it is not a "
00142                               "valid C variable name.").arg(nameEdit_->text()),
00143                            QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00144         msgBox.setInformativeText("Please enter a name containing only characters A-Z, a-z, 0-9 or _ "
00145                                   "and starting with A-Z or a-z.");
00146         msgBox.exec();
00147         return;
00148     }
00149 
00150     QDialog::accept();
00151 }
00152 
00153 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 // Function: onContentChanged()
00155 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00156 void EndpointEditDialog::onContentChanged()
00157 {
00158     btnOK_->setEnabled(!nameEdit_->text().isEmpty());
00159 }
